prompt_base: feral beast-man, muscular physique, translucent green skin, wild orange mane-like hair, aggressive expression, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: mutated skin texture, prominent veins, wet hair texture, animalistic features, glowing electrical sparks, sharp claws, realistic eyes
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, human skin tone, organic, smooth skin, low quality, blurry face, (cute furry:1.3), (human face:1.2), too soft
